onyomiExamples.meaning: difficulty, hardship, trouble, distress, infeasibility, inability (to carry out)

onyomiExamples.reading: ゼッタイテキヒンコン

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be troubled, to have difficulty, to be in a fix, to be at a loss, to be stumped, to be embarrassed, to be bothered, to be inconvenienced, to be annoyed, to be badly off, to be hard up, to be in straitened circumstances
